package.name: HTTP_Session
package.summary: Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions
package.description: Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions it provides extra features such as database storage for session data using DB package. It introduces new methods like isNew(), useCookies(), setExpire(), setIdle(), isExpired(), isIdled() and others.

release.notes: Fixed errors in the DB storage container (thanks to Graeme Merrall)
